An addendum to my Jeff Bagwell encounter at EWR. Great guy to meet. Very patient. 

He was in first class and when I walked by he was watching the @astros game on his phone and my brain shut off and I said ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs the score slugger?‚Äù and I immediately wished I was never born.
